en: I want to eat ice cream.
example: I want to eat ice cream now.
She wants to go home early.

en: We want to watch a movie.
example: We want to watch a movie tonight.

en: He wants to buy a toy.
example: He wants to buy a toy at the store.
They want to travel next summer.
You want to learn English well.
I want to play outside now.
She wants to eat cake after school.

en: We want to buy new books.
example: We want to buy new books at the store.

en: He wants to learn to drive.
example: He wants to learn to drive next year.
They want to play together after school.

en: You want to visit your friend.
example: You want to visit your friend this weekend.

en: I want to try the new game.
example: I want to try the new game tonight.
She wants to study abroad next year.

en: We want to help the animals.
example: We want to help the animals at the shelter.
